.. _`fa_file`:

FA_FILE
=======

Read fasta files and return it as a RDS object





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_rsamtools_fafile:
        input:
            fasta="genome.fa",
            fai="genome.fa.fai"
        output:
            rds="sequence.rds"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/Rsamtools/FaFile"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
